name: Jolteon
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Its lungs contain an organ that creates electricity. The crackling sound of electricity can be heard when it exhales.

abilities.name: Electromagnetic Wall
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.
